





..
    Classes and methods

Class RuleSet
================================================================================

..
   class-title


A model defining the structure of an object containing the CSS rules defined in a CSS file.








    


Constructor
-----------

.. js:class:: RuleSet(data)



    
    :param Object data: 
        the CSS data received from the server 
    
    :param Integer data.ruleCount: 
        the number of rules inside the file 
    
    :param Integer data.length: 
        the length of the content inside the file 
    
    :param String data.content: 
        the content of the CSS file 
    







    

Attributes
----------

..
   class-attributes


content
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''

.. js:attribute:: content   


the CSS content inside the set








    



length
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''

.. js:attribute:: length   


the length of the content inside the set








    



ruleCount
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''

.. js:attribute:: ruleCount   


the number of rules in the set
